dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, I have some pretty cool news for our listeners, especially those in Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, I have some pretty cool news for our listeners, especially those in Kazakhstan!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? Spill it! What's the scoop?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Spill it! What's the scoop?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, get this: they're going to get an additional day off in July 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, get this: they're going to get an additional day off in July twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis will receive an additional day off in July 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ooh, an extra day off? [interrupts] That's always good news. What's it for, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ooh, an extra day off? That's always good news. What's it for, though?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, right? It's for, uh, Capital City Day, which is traditionally observed on July 6th. It's a pretty big public holiday over there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, right? It's for, uh, Capital City Day, which is traditionally observed on July sixth. It's a pretty big public holiday over there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July 2025, citizens of Kazakhstan will enjoy long weekends in celebration of one of the countryâ„¢s major public holidays " Capital City Day, traditionally observed on July 6.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, Capital City Day! That, uh, commemorates the capital moving from Almaty to Astana, if I remember correctly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, Capital City Day! That, uh, commemorates the capital moving from Almaty to Astana, if I remember correctly?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The holiday commemorates the relocation of the capital from Almaty to Astana in 1998.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Back in 1998. And usually, they have, like, huge celebrations, concerts, festivals, street fairs... especially in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Back in nineteen ninety eight. And usually, they have, like, huge celebrations, concerts, festivals, street fairs... especially in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The holiday commemorates the relocation of the capital from Almaty to Astana in 1998. Each year, large-scale celebrations are held across the country, especially in Astana, with concerts, festivals, street fairs, and exhibitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I've seen pictures, it looks incredible. So, how does that translate to an *extra* day off, though? Is it just, like, a random bonus day?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I've seen pictures, it looks incredible. So, how does that translate to an extra day off, though? Is it just, like, a random bonus day?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, there's a reason! So, in 2025, July 6th actually falls on a Sunday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, there's a reason! So, in twenty twenty five, July sixth actually falls on a Sunday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2025, July 6 falls on a Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, I see where this is going!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, I see where this is going!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep! According to their law "On Holidays," the day off is actually moved to Monday, July 7th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep! According to their law On Holidays, the day off is actually moved to Monday, July seventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the law On Holidays, the day off is moved to Monday, July 7.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, wait, that means... [overlaps slightly] a three-day weekend!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, wait, that means... a three-day weekend!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This means there will be a three-day weekend from July 5 to July 7.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! From July 5th to July 7th. That's a pretty sweet deal, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! From July fifth to July seventh. That's a pretty sweet deal, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This means there will be a three-day weekend from July 5 to July 7.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That is fantastic! So much time to enjoy all those festivals you mentioned, or, you know, just relax.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is fantastic! So much time to enjoy all those festivals you mentioned, or, you know, just relax.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Or even, uh, plan a little getaway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Or even, uh, plan a little getaway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Always nice to have a long weekend to look forward to, especially in the summer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Always nice to have a long weekend to look forward to, especially in the summer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. So, mark your calendars, Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. So, mark your calendars, Kazakhstan!
